page.title: 05Bowden Hall Hotel
page.content: Bowden Hall is a private hotel based and situated in 23 acres of land. The original building is 200 years old. There is a legend of an eighteen year old girl who fell into the lake and her ghost has since been seen by residents and staff roaming the corridors. The hotel has 23 bedrooms and soon there will be 26. Each room has its own bathroom and suite and colour television. The hotel has a con ference room, a cavery, 3 bars, a ballroom, a charcoal grill and beafort room. It was first built by Major Birchall who gave alot to the village. Jim Davidson, Bob Monkhouse and Gareth Hunt have stayed at Bowden Hall Hotel.
